slides.content: "For so long I have yearned to take that which I intellectually understood, to reach me on deepest level. It has literally shifted my perspective on life and how I approach it and t has enabled me to approach my challenges with a new sense of confidence and faith."
slides.name: Christine Masdammer
slides.title: Marketing Expert

slides.content: "First, I just want to say thank you! Of all of the programs and seminars that I have done (and there have been a lot), Joanna's guidance is hands down the one that has made the biggest impact in my life. It has been life changing, for the best, of course. Thank you, Joanna."
slides.name: Maria Belafonte
slides.title: Medical Technician
